title: Paysafe
body: Hey guys!I recently bought a paysafe and I wanted to purchase it in league of legends,but because I am in Greece(cause capital controls) cant purchase it on my account.Cant someone help??

replies.body:
It doesn't look like Paysafe is an option for players from Greece at this time, but you can grab a Riot Points Prepaid card from these vendors:

>Public
Plaisio
MediaMarkt

Regarding your already purchased Paysafe card, definitely reach out to our Billing specialists, as I'm confident they'll be able to work with you on a solution. Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hey LordOfLoLGRE,

If you're having trouble with your payment method, I suggest submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If possible, the Billing team would be happy to try and help.
